summary: 17 rug options to add to your mods
descriptionHtml:
[center]Do not use any of my resources for pay to play mods[/center]
[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Reviews-[/b][/color]
GohanOwns says:
[color=gold][size=5]"Beautiful"[/size][/color]
Wyspr says:
[color=gold][size=5]"Put some in my cottage and they are beautiful! Endorsed!"[/size][/color]

[color=white][b]My Rug Resource is being used by:[/b][/color]
xenogeist007's [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89986672]Xeno's Rest[/url]
jackrabb1t's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22147]Geir Manor[/url]
gentester's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23987]Candle Pond Ranch[/url]
dj2005's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24933]Forgotten Windmill[/url]

[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Short Description-[/b][/color]
This resource pack includes 17 new rug textures for modders.
There are 12 rectangle rugs and 5 round rugs.

[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Long Description-[/b][/color]
[color=silver]I have made a few of these for myself as the rug options in game are not the greatest and when I saw the new nexus [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/news/article.php?id=123]challenge[/url] of house mods thought it would be good to upload my variations to help those wanting to add a touch of uniqueness. The Rectangle shaped rugs have been changed to 1024x2048 were the round rugs are 1024x1024.[/color]

[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Installation-[/b][/color]
[color=silver]Copy the meshes in Skyrim/Data/meshes/clutter/common/
Copy the textures in Skyrim/Data/textures/clutter/common/
In the Creation Kit, right-click in Statics, click New, then Edit and choose a rug mesh (You can reference the Screens folder for help). Name it. Place it.[/color]

[color=Lightskyblue][b]-PERMISSIONS AND CREDIT-[/b][/color]
[color=silver]Feel free to use these resources in your own mods without asking as long as you give me proper credits.[/color]

[b]-My Mods-[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68406]Summerset Isle[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17865]Highland Milk Farm[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20880]-The Divine Octavo-[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15701]Better Cows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16611]Better Goats[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16291]Better Skeever[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12723]Tutorial for Unique Merchant Dialogue[/url]
author: yourenotsupposedtobeinhere
